typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		peapeaid as long,
		peainvisible as string,
		peaiebusndiv as integer,
		peaiecond as string,
		peaprobor as integer,
		peaiyear as integer,
		peasex as string,
		peacorrmailfreq as integer,
		peanopurr as string,
		peaoutgirono as string,
		peaclosmailfreq as integer,
		peaieint5 as string,
		last_updated_by as string,
		peaclmmailfreq as integer,
		peainvnotify as integer,
		peaacorbo as integer,
		peamexcdate as date,
		peaaddmailfreq as integer,
		peaieint3 as string,
		peamailsizemb as decimal(28,10),
		peaiediv as string,
		peaorgno as string,
		peaaclmbo as integer,
		peacalamt as long,
		peaxlcurr as string,
		map_date as date,
		peaccintr as decimal(28,10),
		peaextid2 as string,
		peapurnotify as integer,
		peaccode as integer,
		peasw10 as string,
		peaaclmadv as integer,
		peaclomet as integer,
		peacloclm as integer,
		peamexamt as long,
		peaprotyp as integer,
		peanotsort as integer,
		peaieint1 as string,
		peaiecon3 as integer,
		peaincreday as integer,
		peapersid as string,
		peaaaddbo as integer,
		peanotdays as integer,
		peaaclobo as integer,
		peacalcurr as string,
		peaprovad as integer,
		peafromcomp as long,
		peastopuse as string,
		peaclmadv as integer,
		peasttniv as integer,
		peamexcurr as string,
		peaiecon4 as integer,
		peasubtype as integer,
		peaswrun as integer,
		pealeicode as string,
		peaoutcreday as integer,
		peaoutgiro as integer,
		peamexpro as decimal(28,10),
		peaoutgiroludate as date,
		peaiecon2 as integer,
		peaieint2 as string,
		peastdate as date,
		peaclamailfreq as integer,
		peacclamt as long,
		pealang2 as string,
		peastatyp as integer,
		peaingirolusign as string,
		peacrsign as string,
		peaie2busnse as integer,
		peabirtno as string,
		peaiesect as string,
		peaaddbor as integer,
		peaieint4 as string,
		peasttprmclm as integer,
		peaiebusnse as integer,
		peanotaco as integer,
		peastaamt as integer,
		peacclcurr as string,
		peaextid as string,
		peaendate as date,
		peacomp2 as integer,
		peabirtws as integer,
		peaie2busndiv as integer,
		pearesdat as date,
		peausecolfee as string,
		peanotlay as integer,
		pealudate as date,
		peaxlpoin as long,
		peaoutgirolusign as string,
		peaprenotify as integer,
		peacrdate as date,
		peaaprobo as integer,
		peanopdue as integer,
		peaingiroludate as date,
		peaie3busnse as integer,
		date_inserted as date,
		peapurtyp as integer,
		inserted_by as string,
		peapersrfl as long,
		peacorbo as integer,
		peastaniv as integer,
		date_last_updated as date,
		peastensw as integer,
		peaccint as string,
		peaswink as integer,
		pealusign as string,
		peaiecon5 as integer,
		peaknvmark as string,
		peastopcod as integer,
		peacrmid as long,
		peaieint as string,
		peamaxper as decimal(28,10),
		peastoppremnote as string,
		peaiecon1 as integer,
		peamdescr as string,
		peaclmintynsw as string,
		peadueday as integer,
		peaingirono as string,
		peaie3busndiv as integer,
		peaprovmailfreq as integer,
		peaclmbor as integer,
		peacolid as string,
		peaingiro as integer,
		peaclobor as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		lgacrcrdate as date,
		lgaintnote as string,
		lgacrsign as string,
		lgacandate as date,
		lgaclmcat as string,
		lgacrcrsign as string,
		lgaintynsw as string,
		lgastatus as string,
		lgastdate as date,
		lgalccid as string,
		lgaguacurr as string,
		lgacrynsw as string,
		lgacrlgaid as string,
		lgalgaid as string,
		lgaobocname as string,
		lgaludate as date,
		lgaobopeaid as long,
		lgalcaid as string,
		lgareceiver as long,
		lgajurisdiction as string,
		lgaknvmark as string,
		lgaln2 as integer,
		lgalusign as string,
		lgaguaamt as long,
		lgaendate as date,
		lgacrdate as date,
		lgacrcode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(peapeaid == lgareceiver,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 derive(gut_key = lgalgaid,
		gut_guarantee_type_desc = case(lgacrcode== 'C', 'Provided Guarantee', case(lgacrcode == 'R','Received Guarantee','Received Counter Guarantee' ) ),
		gut_guarantee_type_code = lgacrcode,
		gut_guarantee_status = case(lgastatus== 'A', 'Open', case(lgastatus == 'R','Closed','Closed' ) ),
		gut_inc_key = lgalcaid,
		gut_open_ind = case(lgastatus== 'A', 'Y', case(lgastatus == 'R','N','N' ) )) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		gut_guarantee_type_desc,
		gut_key,
		gut_guarantee_type_code,
		gut_guarantee_status,
		gut_inc_key,
		gut_open_ind,
		gut_date_given = lgastdate,
		gut_date_expiry = lgaendate,
		{gut_guarantee-remarks} = lgaintnote,
		gut_date_created = lgacrcrdate,
		gut_guarantee_issued_to = peamdescr
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(inserted_by = 'M_PRE_DIM_GUARANTEE_ME',
		inserted_date = currentTimestamp(),
		last_updated_by = 'M_PRE_DIM_GUARANTEE_ME',
		date_last_updated = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 sink(input(
		gut_key as string,
		gut_guarantee_issued_by as string,
		gut_guarantee_number as decimal(28,10),
		gut_date_created as date,
		gut_inc_key as string,
		gut_date_given as date,
		gut_guarantee_issued_to as string,
		gut_guarantee_remarks as string,
		gut_date_cancelled as date,
		gut_outside_cover_ind as string,
		gut_open_ind as string,
		date_inserted as date,
		gut_form_of_guarantee_code as string,
		gut_guarantee_type_desc as string,
		gut_guarantee_status as string,
		gut_form_of_guarantee_desc as string,
		gut_date_expiry as date,
		gut_guarantee_type_code as string,
		gut_interests_and_costs_incl as string,
		gut_jurisdiction as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		last_updated_by as string,
		gut_counter_guarantee_for as decimal(28,10),
		date_last_updated as date,
		gut_guarantee_provider as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
